s331: Twenty-eighth year. Pei Gong issued three chapter command, Qin people greatly pleased.
s337: Eighth year. Divided Chu into four.
s339: Twenty-fifth year. Divided Zhao as Dai state.
s340: Eighteenth year. Xiang Yu resented Rong, divided Qi into three states.
s341: Twenty-ninth year. Had marriage alliance with Xiang Yu, met him below Xi, reconciled. Yu broke covenant, divided Guanzhong into four states.
s344: Twentieth year. Divided Han as Henan state.
s368: Seventeenth year. Xiang Ji established himself as Western Chu Overlord.
s372: Twenty-sixth year. Changed name to Changshan.
s630: Twelfth year. Han took our Bei Di.
s965: Fourth month. Chu besieged king at Xingyang.
s1042: Lin Jiang King Juan. Beginning, Ao's son.
s1049: Eighth month. Zhou Kao and Song Gong killed Wei Bao.
s1103: Eleventh month. Han general Han Xin broke and killed Long Ju.
s1107: Zhao King Zhang Er beginning, Han established him.
